com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers
Class AbstractCadMemoryDriver

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.MemoryDriver
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.AbstractCadMemoryDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Driver, GDBMSDriver, ObjectDriver, ReadAccess, BoundedShapes, VectorialDriver
Direct Known Subclasses:
DXFMemoryDriver
public abstract class AbstractCadMemoryDriver
extends MemoryDriver

Abstract base class for CAD drivers (dxf, dwg) memory drivers. Features readed with these drivers share the same schema (static FieldDescription[])

Author:
azabala

getCadSource

public abstract java.lang.Object getCadSource(int index)
Any feature of this kind of driver will be associated to a cad drawing entity. This method will return this drawing entity

Parameters:
index - position of the drawing entity

addRegionOfInterest

public void addRegionOfInterest(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D roi)
As CAD files are designed primary to printing task, in a cad file (dwg, dgn, dxf, etc.) could exist real world entities (thinked to work in a GIS system) in real world coordinates (UTM, Lambert, etc.) and paper entities, like transversal profiles, electrical circuits, etc. thinked to do a final print. This region of interest allow to filter cad entities by a zone.
